  "example_ability"
  {
    "ID"              "1852"
    "AbilityBehavior"       "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED"
    "BaseClass"           "ability_datadriven"
    "AbilityTextureName"      "holdout_blade_fury"

    // Stats
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityCastRange"        "1000"
    "AbilityCastPoint"        "0.0"
    "AbilityCooldown"       "10.0"
    "AbilityChannelTime"      "2.0 1.8 1.6 1.5"
    "AbilityUnitDamageType"     "DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"
    "AbilityCastAnimation"      "ACT_DOTA_DISABLED"
    "AbilityDamage"         "400 600 800 1000"
    
    "precache"
    {
      "particle"          "particles/econ/generic/generic_aoe_explosion_sphere_1/generic_aoe_explosion_sphere_1.vpcf"
      "soundfile"         "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_gyrocopter.vsndevts"
    }

    // Item Info
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityManaCost"       "300"
    "SideShop"            "1"
    
    "OnSpellStart"
    {
      "ApplyModifier"
      {
        "Target"    "CASTER"
        "ModifierName"  "modifier_channel_start"
      }
      "FireSound"
      {
        "EffectName"    "Hero_Gyrocopter.CallDown.Fire"
        "Target"      "CASTER"
      }
    }
    
    "OnChannelSucceeded"
    {
      "RemoveModifier"
      {
        "Target"        "CASTER"
        "ModifierName"      "modifier_channel_start"
      }
      "AttachEffect"
      {
        "EffectName"      "particles/econ/generic/generic_aoe_explosion_sphere_1/generic_aoe_explosion_sphere_1.vpcf"
        "EffectAttachType"    "follow_origin"
        "EffectRadius"      "%radius"
        "EffectDurationScale" "1"
        "EffectLifeDurationScale" "1"
        "EffectColorA"      "255 0 0"
        "EffectColorB"      "255 0 0"
        "Target"      "CASTER"
      }
      
      "Damage"
      {
        "Type"          "DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"
        "Damage"        "%damage"
        "Target"
        {
          "Center"      "CASTER"
          "Radius"      "%radius"
          "Teams"       "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
          "Types"       "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
        }
      }
      
      "Knockback"
      {
        "Center"  "CASTER"
        "Target"
        {
          "Center"  "CASTER"
          "Radius"  "%radius"
          "Teams"   "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
        }
        "Duration"  "%duration"
        "Distance"  "%distance"
        "Height"  "%height"
      }
      
      "FireSound"
      {
        "EffectName"    "Hero_Gyrocopter.CallDown.Damage"
        "Target"      "CASTER"
      }
    }
    
    "OnChannelFinish"
    {
      "RemoveModifier"
      {
        "Target"        "CASTER"
        "ModifierName"      "modifier_channel_start"
      }
    }
    
    "OnChannelInterrupted"
    {
      "RemoveModifier"
      {
        "Target"    "CASTER"
        "ModifierName"  "modifier_channel_start"
      }
    }
    
    "Modifiers"
    {
      "modifier_channel_start"
      {
        "OnCreated"
        {
          "AttachEffect"
          {
            "IsHidden" "1"
            "EffectName"    "particles/test_particle/channel_field_2.vpcf"//"gyro_calldown_marker_c"//"gyrocopter_call_down"
            "EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
            "Target"      "CASTER"
            
            "EffectRadius"      "%radius"
            "EffectColorA"      "255 0 0"
            "EffectColorB"      "255 0 0"
          
            "ControlPoints"
            {
              "00"    "50 100 5"
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
    
    // Special  
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilitySpecial"
    {
      "01"
      {
        "var_type"        "FIELD_FLOAT"
        "duration"        "0.5"
      }
      
      "02"
      {
        "var_type"        "FIELD_INTEGER"
        "damage"        "400 600 800 1000"
      }

"breathe_fire_datadriven"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DIRECTIONAL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET"
    "MaxLevel"						"4"	
	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
	"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"	   
	"AbilityUnitTargetFlags"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"	
	"AbilityTextureName"			"danzai"
	"AbilityCastAnimation" 			"act_dota_attack"
	
	

	// Precache
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"500"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.2"

	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	{
		"soundfile"					"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_phoenix.vsndevts"
		"particle"					"particles/units/heroes/hero_phoenix/phoenix_supernova_death.vpcf"
		"particle"					"particles/units/heroes/hero_phoenix/phoenix_supernova_egg.vpcf"

		"particle"					"particles/units/heroes/hero_phoenix/phoenix_supernova_start.vpcf"
	}
	
	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"FireSound"
		{
			"EffectName"		"ember_spirit_embr_death_01"
			"Target"			"CASTER"
		}
		
		"AttachEffect"
		{
			"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_phoenix/phoenix_supernova_start.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"	"PATTACH_ABSORIGIN"
			"Target"			"CASTER"
		}
		
		"SpawnUnit"
		{
			"UnitName"		"npc_dummy_unit"
			"UnitCount"		"1"
			"SpawnRadius"	"0"

		//	"Duration"		"%AbilityDuration"

			{

				{
					"Target"		"TARGET"

				}

				{

	}
	
	"Modifiers"
	{

				}
			}

			{

	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.3 0.3 0.3 0.3"

	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		"01"

			"duration"			"4.5"
		}

			"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"radius"			"700"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"movespeed_slow"	"-40 -50 -60"
		}
		"04"
		{
			"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"attackspeed_slow"	"-80 -100 -120"
		}
		"05"
		{
			"var_type"			"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"vision_duration"	"6.0"
		}
		// Extra variable
		"06"
		{
			"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"vision_radius"		"900"
		}
	}
	
	// Data driven
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	
	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"FireEffect"
		{
			"TargetPoint"			"POINT"
			"EffectName"			"particles/econ/items/crystal_maiden/crystal_maiden_cowl_of_ice/maiden_crystal_nova_cowlofice.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"		"world_origin"

			{
				"01"				"%radius 2 %radius*2"
			}
		}

		{
			"EffectName"			"yoshino.zayac_attack"
			"Target"				"CASTER"
		}
	
		"ActOnTargets"
		{
			"Target"
			{
				"Center"		"POINT"
				"Radius"		"%radius"
				"Teams"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY" 
				"Type"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
			}
			
			"Action"
			{
				"Damage"
				{
					"Target"	"TARGET"
					"Damage"	"%AbilityDamage"
					"Type"		"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
				}
				
				"ApplyModifier"
				{
					"Target"		"TARGET"
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_crystal_nova_slow_datadriven"
				}
			}
		}
		
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"		"heroes/crystal_nova.lua"
			"Function"			"crystal_nova_post_vision"
			"Target"			"POINT"
		}
	}
	
	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_crystal_nova_slow_datadriven"
		{
			"Duration"				"%duration"
			"EffectName"			"particles/generic_gameplay/generic_slowed_cold.vpcf"
			"StatusEffectName"		"particles/status_fx/status_effect_frost_lich.vpcf"
			"StatusEffectPriority"	"10"
		
			"Properties"
			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT"	"%attackspeed_slow"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE"	"%movespeed_slow"
			}
		}
	}

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	"AbilityCastRange"				"900"

	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"50 45 40"
	
	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"250 300 350"
	
	// Special	
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"radius"				"800"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"duration"				"7 8 9"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"damage"				"75 125 155"
		}
		"04"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"slow"		"-80 -90 -100"
		}
		"05"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"tick_rate"				"0.5"
		}
	}

	"precache"
	{
		"soundfile"	"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_alchemist.vsndevts"
		"particle"  "particles/alchemist_acid_spray1.vpcf"
	}

	"OnSpellStart"
	{
	 	"CreateThinker"
	 	{
	 		"ModifierName"	"modifier_acid_spray_thinker"
	 		"Target" 		"POINT"
	 	}
	} 

	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_acid_spray_thinker"
		{
			"Aura"					"modifier_acid_spray"
			"Aura_Radius"			"%radius"
			"Aura_Teams"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
			"Aura_Types"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_CREEP | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_MECHANICAL"
			
			"Duration"				"%duration"

			"OnCreated"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/acid_spray.lua"
					"Function"		"AcidSpraySound"
				}

				"AttachEffect"
				{
					"EffectName"		"particles/alchemist_acid_spray1.vpcf"
					"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
					"Target"			"TARGET"
					"ControlPoints"
					{
						"00" "0 0 0"
						"01" "%radius 1 1"
						"15" "25 150 25"
						"16" "0 0 0"
					}
				}
			}
		}

		"modifier_acid_spray"
		{
			"IsDebuff"		"1"
			"ThinkInterval"	"%tick_rate"
			"Properties"
			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT"	"%slow"
			}
			"OnIntervalThink"
			{
				"FireSound"
				{
					"EffectName" 	"Hero_Alchemist.AcidSpray.Damage"
					"Target"		"TARGET"
				}
				"Damage"
				{
					"Target"		 "TARGET"
					"Type"			 "DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
					"Damage"		 "%damage"
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

"windrunner_powershot_datadriven"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"	
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
	"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_CUSTOM"
	"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"blackrock5"
	"AbilityCastAnimation"          "ACT_DOTA_CHANNEL_ABILITY_5"
	"MaxLevel"                      "1"
	"RequiredLevel"                 "30"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"3500"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.0"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"160"
	"AbilityChannelTime"			"3.0"

	// Damage.
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityDamage"					"7000"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"450"

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"damage_reduction"		"0"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"speed_reduction"		"0.0 0.0 0.0 0.0"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"arrow_width"			"300"
		}
		"04"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"arrow_range"			"3800"
		}
		"05"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"arrow_speed"			"3000.0 3000.0 3000.0 3000.0"
		}
		"06"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"tree_width"			"75 75 75 75"
		}
		"07"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"vision_radius"			"400 400 400 400"
		}
		"08"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"vision_duration"		"3.34 3.34 3.34 3.34"
		}
		// Extra variable
		"09"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"charge_interval"		"0.01"
		}
		"10"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"damage_per_interval"	"0.01"
		}
		"11"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"charge_time"			"1.0"
		}
	}
	
	// Data driven
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	
	
	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"FireSound"
		{
			"Target"				"CASTER"
			"EffectName"			"blackrock.shooter"
		}

		// Reset speed and damage variables and set timer for channel
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"			"heroes/powershot.lua"
			"Function"				"powershot_initialize"
			"Target"				"POINT"
		}
		
		"ApplyModifier"
		{
			"Target"				"CASTER"
			"ModifierName"			"modifier_powershot_charge_datadriven"
		}		
	}
	
	"OnChannelFinish"
	{
		"RemoveModifier"
		{
			"Target"				"CASTER"
			"ModifierName"			"modifier_powershot_charge_datadriven"
		}
		
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"			"heroes/powershot.lua"
			"Function"				"powershot_start_traverse"
		}
	}
	
	"OnProjectileHitUnit"
	{
		"DeleteOnHit"				"false"
	
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"			"heroes/powershot.lua"
			"Function"				"powershot_register_unit"
		}
	}
	
	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_powershot_charge_datadriven"
		{
			"Duration"				"%charge_time"
		
			"OnCreated"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/powershot.lua"
					"Function"		"powershot_charge"
				}
			}
		
			"ThinkInterval"			"%charge_interval"
			"OnIntervalThink"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/powershot.lua"
					"Function"		"powershot_charge"
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

"sound_sign"

	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	"AbilityTextureName"			"len_3"
	"AOERadius"						"%radius"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"700"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.3"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	// Damage.
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityDamage"					"5000"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"			"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"duration"			"2.5"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"radius"			"400"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"movespeed_slow"	"-50"
		}
		"04"
		{
			"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"attackspeed_slow"	"-50"
		}
		"05"
		{
			"var_type"			"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"vision_duration"	"6.0"
		}
		// Extra variable
		"06"
		{
			"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"vision_radius"		"900"
		}
	}
	
	// Data driven
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"precache"
	{
		"particle"				"particles/sound_sign.vpcf"

	}
	
	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"FireEffect"
		{
			"TargetPoint"			"POINT"
			"EffectName"			"particles/sound_sign.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"		"world_origin"
			"ControlPoints"
			{
				"01"				"%radius 2 %radius*2"
			}
		}
		
		"FireSound"
		{
			"EffectName"			"len.2"
			"Target"				"CASTER"
		}
	
		"ActOnTargets"
		{
			"Target"
			{
				"Center"		"POINT"
				"Radius"		"%radius"
				"Teams"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY" 
				"Type"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
			}
			
			"Action"
			{
				"Damage"
				{
					"Target"	"TARGET"
					"Damage"	"%AbilityDamage"
					"Type"		"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
				}
				
				"ApplyModifier"
				{
					"Target"		"TARGET"
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_crystal_nova_slow_datadriven"
				}
			}
		}
		
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"		"heroes/hero_crystal_maiden/crystal_nova.lua"
			"Function"			"crystal_nova_post_vision"
			"Target"			"POINT"
		}
	}
	
	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_crystal_nova_slow_datadriven"
		{
			"Duration"				"%duration"
			"EffectName"			"particles/generic_gameplay/generic_slowed_cold.vpcf"
			"StatusEffectName"		"particles/status_fx/status_effect_frost_lich.vpcf"
			"StatusEffectPriority"	"10"
		
			"Properties"
			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT"	"%attackspeed_slow"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE"	"%movespeed_slow"
			}
		}
	}
}

"c1_spider"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"deidara_1"

	// Precache
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	
	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.3"

	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"30 27 24 20"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"145 160 180 200"

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"wolf_index"				"1 2 3 4"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"wolf_duration"				"55.0 55.0 55.0 55.0"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"wolf_bat"					"1.25 1.2 1.15 1.1"
		}
		"04"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"wolf_damage"				"18 29 37 46"
		}
		"05"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"wolf_hp"					"100 150 200 250"
		}
		"06" // Extra variables for "SpawnUnit" to decide which level of wolves will be used
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"wolf_1_count"				"1 0 0 0"
		}
		"07"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"wolf_2_count"				"0 1 0 0"
		}
		"08"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"wolf_3_count"				"0 0 1 0"
		}
		"09"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"wolf_4_count"				"0 0 0 1"
		}
		"10"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"spawn_distance"			"250"	
		}
		"11"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"damage"			"100 150 200 250"	
		}
	}

	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"FireSound"
		{
			"EffectName"	""
			"Target"		"CASTER"
		}

		"AttachEffect"
		{
			"EffectName"	""
			"EffectName"	"start_at_customorigin"
			"Target"		"CASTER"	
		}	

		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"	"scripts/vscripts/heroes/summon_wolves.lua"
			"Function"		"KillWolves"
		}

		"SpawnUnit"
		{
			"UnitName"		"npc_dota_c1_spider1"
			"Target"
			{
				"Center"	"CASTER"
				"ScriptSelectPoints"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"scripts/vscripts/heroes/summon_wolves.lua"
					"Function"	"GetSummonPoints"
					"Target"	"CASTER"
					"Count"	"1"
					"distance"	"%spawn_distance"
				}
			}

			"Duration"	"%wolf_duration"
			"UnitCount"	"%wolf_1_count" 
			"UnitLimit"	"2"
			"GrantsGold"	"1"
			"GrantsXP"		"1"
			"SpawnRadius"	"10"
			"OnSpawn"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"scripts/vscripts/heroes/summon_wolves.lua"
					"Function"		"SetUnitsMoveForward"
				}

				"ApplyModifier"
				{
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_summon_wolves_datadriven"
					"Target"		"TARGET"
					"Duration"		"%duration"
				}
			}
		}

		"SpawnUnit"
		{
			"UnitName"		"npc_dota_c1_spider2"
			"Target"
			{
				"Center"	"CASTER"
				"ScriptSelectPoints"
				{

				}

	{

			"Target"		"CASTER"
		}

		{
			"EffectName"	""
			"EffectName"	"start_at_customorigin"
			"Target"		"CASTER"

		}

//Archetype_Earth

"archetype_earth"
	{
		"BaseClass"								"ability_lua"
		"ScriptFile"							"heroes/arcueid.lua"

		"AbilityBehavior"						"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN"
		"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"					"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
		"AbilityUnitTargetType"					"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
